snippet: Two ferry companies said they had received licenses from the Treasury Department authorizing them to start service between Florida and Cuba in a few months.
abstract: Treasury Dept issues licenses to American companies Havana Ferry Partners and Baja Ferries to carry Cuban and American passengers between Miami and Havana, for first time in 50 years.
lead_paragraph: Two ferry companies said they had received licenses from the Treasury Department authorizing them to start service between Florida and Cuba in a few months.

headline.main: U.S. Licenses Ferry Service to Operate Cuba Route
headline.print_headline: U.S. Licenses Ferry Service to Operate Cuba Route
